event.label: Java Monitor Wait
event.description: Waiting on a Java monitor

value.label: Monitor Class
value.description: Class of object waited on

value.label: Notifier Thread
value.description: Notifying Thread

value.label: Timeout
value.description: Maximum wait time

value.label: Timed Out
value.description: Wait has been timed out

value.label: Monitor Address
value.description: Address of object waited on

value.label: Monitor Inflation Cause
value.description: Cause of inflation

event.label: Biased Lock Revocation
event.description: Revoked bias of object

value.label: Lock Class
value.description: Class of object whose biased lock was revoked

value.label: Previous Owner
value.description: Thread owning the bias before revocation

event.label: Biased Lock Self Revocation
event.description: Revoked bias of object biased towards own thread

value.label: Lock Class
value.description: Class of object whose biased lock was revoked

event.label: Biased Lock Class Revocation
event.description: Revoked biases for all instances of a class

value.label: Revoked Class
value.description: Class whose biased locks were revoked

value.label: Disable Further Biasing
value.description: Whether further biasing for instances of this class will be allowed

event.label: Reserved Stack Activation
event.description: Activation of Reserved Stack Area caused by stack overflow with ReservedStackAccess annotated method in call stack

value.label: Start Address
value.description: Start address of the virtual space

value.label: Committed End Address
value.description: End address of the committed memory for the virtual space

value.label: Committed Size
value.description: Size of the committed memory for the virtual space

value.label: Reserved End Address
value.description: End address of the reserved memory for the virtual space

value.label: Reserved Size
value.description: Size of the reserved memory for the virtual space

value.label: Start Address
value.description: Start address of the space

value.label: End Address
value.description: End address of the space

value.label: Used
value.description: Bytes allocated by objects in the space

value.label: Size
value.description: Size of the space

value.label: Heap Used
value.description: Bytes allocated by objects in the heap

value.label: Committed
value.description: Committed memory for this space

value.label: Used
value.description: Bytes allocated by objects in the space

value.label: Reserved
value.description: Reserved memory for this space

event.label: Garbage Collection
event.description: Garbage collection performed by the JVM

value.label: Name
value.description: The name of the Garbage Collector

value.label: Cause
value.description: The reason for triggering this Garbage Collection

value.label: Sum of Pauses
value.description: Sum of all the times in which Java execution was paused during the garbage collection

value.label: Longest Pause
value.description: Longest individual pause during the garbage collection

event.label: Parallel Old Garbage Collection
event.description: Extra information specific to Parallel Old Garbage Collections

value.label: Dense Prefix
value.description: The address of the dense prefix, used when compacting

event.label: Young Garbage Collection
event.description: Extra information specific to Young Garbage Collections

event.label: Old Garbage Collection
event.description: Extra information specific to Old Garbage Collections

event.label: G1 Garbage Collection
event.description: Extra information specific to G1 Garbage Collections

value.label: Time Slice
value.description: Time slice used to calculate MMU

value.label: GC Time
value.description: Time stopped because of GC during last time slice

value.label: Pause Target
value.description: Max time allowed to be spent on GC during last time slice

value.label: Collection Set Before
value.description: Memory usage before GC in the collection set regions

value.label: Collection Set After
value.description: Memory usage after GC in the collection set regions

value.label: Allocation Regions
value.description: Regions chosen as allocation regions during evacuation (includes survivors and old space regions)

value.label: Allocation Regions Before
value.description: Memory usage before GC in allocation regions

value.label: Allocation Regions After
value.description: Memory usage after GC in allocation regions

event.label: GC Reference Statistics
event.description: Total count of processed references during GC

value.label: Allocated
value.description: Total memory allocated by PLABs

value.label: Wasted
value.description: Total memory wasted within PLABs due to alignment or refill

value.label: Used
value.description: Total memory occupied by objects within PLABs

value.label: Undo Wasted
value.description: Total memory wasted due to allocation undo within PLABs

value.label: Region End Wasted
value.description: Total memory wasted at the end of regions due to refill

value.label: Region Refills
value.description: Total memory wasted at the end of regions due to refill

value.label: Allocated (direct)
value.description: Total memory allocated using direct allocation outside of PLABs

value.label: Used (failure)
value.description: Total memory occupied by objects in regions where evacuation failed

value.label: Wasted (failure)
value.description: Total memory left unused in regions where evacuation failed

event.label: G1 Evacuation Statistics for Young
event.description: Memory related evacuation statistics during GC for the young generation

event.label: G1 Evacuation Memory Statistics for Old
event.description: Memory related evacuation statistics during GC for the old generation

event.label: G1 Basic IHOP Statistics
event.description: Basic statistics related to current IHOP calculation

value.label: Current IHOP Threshold
value.description: Current IHOP threshold

value.label: Current IHOP Threshold
value.description: Current IHOP threshold in percent of old generation

value.label: Target Occupancy
value.description: Target old generation occupancy to reach at the start of mixed GC

value.label: Current Occupancy
value.description: Current old generation occupancy

value.label: Recent Mutator Allocation Size
value.description: Mutator allocation during mutator operation in the most recent interval

value.label: Recent Mutator Duration
value.description: Time the mutator ran in the most recent interval

value.label: Recent Allocation Rate
value.description: Allocation rate of the mutator in the most recent interval in bytes/second

value.label: Last Marking Duration
value.description: Last time from the end of the last initial mark to the first mixed GC

event.label: G1 Adaptive IHOP Statistics
event.description: Statistics related to current adaptive IHOP calculation

value.label: Threshold
value.description: Current IHOP Threshold

value.label: Threshold
value.description: Current IHOP threshold in percent of the internal target occupancy

value.label: IHOP Target Occupancy
value.description: Internal target old generation occupancy to reach at the start of mixed GC

value.label: Current Occupancy
value.description: Current old generation occupancy

value.label: Additional Buffer
value.description: Additional buffer size

value.label: Predicted Allocation Rate
value.description: Current predicted allocation rate for the mutator in bytes/second

value.label: Predicted Marking Duration
value.description: Current predicted time from the end of the last initial mark to the first mixed GC

value.label: Prediction Active
value.description: Indicates whether the adaptive IHOP prediction is active

event.label: Promotion in new PLAB
event.description: Object survived scavenge and was copied to a new Promotion Local Allocation Buffer (PLAB). Supported GCs are Parallel Scavange, G1 and CMS with Parallel New. Due to promotion being done in parallel an object might be reported multiple times as the GC threads race to copy all objects.

value.label: GC Identifier
value.description: Identifier signifying GC during which the object was promoted

value.label: Object Class
value.description: Class of promoted object

value.label: Object Size
value.description: Size of promoted object

value.label: Object Tenuring Age
value.description: Tenuring age of a surviving object before being copied. The tenuring age of an object is a value between 0-15 and is incremented each scavange the object survives. Newly allocated objects have tenuring age 0.

value.label: Tenured
value.description: True if object was promoted to Old space, otherwise the object was aged and copied to a Survivor space

value.label: PLAB Size
value.description: Size of the allocated PLAB to which the object was copied

event.label: Promotion outside PLAB
event.description: Object survived scavenge and was copied directly to the heap. Supported GCs are Parallel Scavange, G1 and CMS with Parallel New. Due to promotion being done in parallel an object might be reported multiple times as the GC threads race to copy all objects.

value.label: GC Identifier
value.description: Identifier signifying GC during which the object was promoted

value.label: Object Class
value.description: Class of promoted object

value.label: Object Size
value.description: Size of promoted object

value.label: Object Tenuring Age
value.description: Tenuring age of a surviving object before being copied. The tenuring age of an object is a value between 0-15 and is incremented each scavange the object survives. Newly allocated objects have tenuring age 0.

value.label: Tenured
value.description: True if object was promoted to Old space, otherwise the object was aged and copied to a Survivor space

event.label: Promotion Failed
event.description: Promotion of an object failed

event.label: Evacuation Failed
event.description: Evacuation of an object failed

event.label: Concurrent Mode Failure
event.description: Concurrent Mode failed

event.label: G1 Heap Region Type Change
event.description: Information about a G1 heap region type change

event.label: Safepoint Begin
event.description: Safepointing begin

value.label: Total Threads
value.description: The total number of threads at the start of safe point

value.label: JNI Critical Threads
value.description: The number of threads in JNI critical sections

event.label: Safepoint State Synchronization
event.description: Synchronize run state of threads

value.label: Initial Threads
value.description: The number of threads running at the beginning of state check

value.label: Running Threads
value.description: The number of threads still running

value.label: Iterations
value.description: Number of state check iterations

event.label: Safepoint Wait Blocked
event.description: Safepointing begin waiting on running threads to block

value.label: Running Threads
value.description: The number running of threads wait for safe point

event.label: Safepoint Cleanup
event.description: Safepointing begin running cleanup tasks

event.label: Safepoint Cleanup Task
event.description: Safepointing begin running cleanup tasks

value.label: Task Name
value.description: The task name

event.label: Safepoint End
event.description: Safepointing end

event.label: VM Operation
event.description: Execution of a VM Operation

value.label: At Safepoint
value.description: If the operation occured at a safepoint

value.label: Caller Blocked
value.description: If the calling thread was blocked until the operation was complete

value.label: Caller
value.description: Thread requesting operation. If non-blocking, will be set to 0 indicating thread is unknown

value.label: Safepoint Identifier
value.description: The safepoint (if any) under which this operation was completed

event.label: VM Shutdown
event.description: VM shutting down

value.label: Reason
value.description: Reason for VM shutdown

event.label: Allocation in new TLAB
event.description: Allocation in new Thread Local Allocation Buffer

value.label: Object Class
value.description: Class of allocated object

event.label: Allocation outside TLAB
event.description: Allocation outside Thread Local Allocation Buffers

value.label: Object Class
value.description: Class of allocated object

event.label: Opto instance object allocation
event.description: Allocation by Opto jitted method

value.label: Object Class
value.description: Class of allocated instance object

value.label: Opto Instance Object Allocation Address
value.description: Address of allocated instance object

event.label: Opto array object allocation
event.description: Array Allocation by Opto jitted method

value.label: Object Class
value.description: Class of allocated array object

value.label: Opto Array Object Allocation Address
value.description: Address of allocated instance object

value.label: Object Size
value.description: The Array Object Size

event.label: Old Object Sample
event.description: A potential memory leak

value.label: Array Elements
value.description: If the object is an array, the number of elements, or -1 if it is not an array

event.label: Recording Reason
event.description: Who requested the recording and why

value.label: Reason
value.description: Reason for writing recording data to disk

value.label: Recording Id
value.description: Id of the recording that triggered the dump, or -1 if it was not related to a recording

event.label: Data Loss
event.description: Data could not be copied out from a buffer, typically because of contention

value.label: Amount
value.description: Amount lost data

value.label: Total
value.description: Total lost amount for thread

event.label: JVM Information
event.description: Description of JVM and the Java application

event.label: CPU Load
event.description: OS CPU Load

value.label: Switch Rate
value.description: Number of context switches per second

event.label: Physical Memory
event.description: OS Physical Memory

value.label: Total Size
value.description: Total amount of physical memory available to OS

value.label: Used Size
value.description: Total amount of physical memory in use

event.label: Method Profiling Sample
event.description: Snapshot of a threads state

event.label: Method Profiling Sample Native
event.description: Snapshot of a threads state when in native

value.label: Base Address
value.description: Starting address of the module

value.label: Top Address
value.description: Ending address of the module

event.label: GC Configuration
event.description: The configuration of the garbage collector

value.label: Young Garbage Collector
value.description: The garbage collector used for the young generation

value.label: Old Garbage Collector
value.description: The garbage collector used for the old generation

value.label: Parallel GC Threads
value.description: Number of parallel threads to use for garbage collection

value.label: Concurrent GC Threads
value.description: Number of concurrent threads to use for garbage collection

value.label: Uses Dynamic GC Threads
value.description: Whether a dynamic number of GC threads are used or not

value.label: Concurrent Explicit GC
value.description: Whether System.gc() is concurrent or not

value.label: Disabled Explicit GC
value.description: Whether System.gc() will cause a garbage collection or not

value.label: Pause Target
value.description: Target for GC pauses

value.label: GC Time Ratio
value.description: Target for runtime vs garbage collection time

event.label: GC Survivor Configuration
event.description: The configuration of the survivors of garbage collection

value.label: Maximum Tenuring Threshold
value.description: Upper limit for the age of how old objects to keep in the survivor area

value.label: Initial Tenuring Threshold
value.description: Initial age limit for how old objects to keep in survivor area

event.label: TLAB Configuration
event.description: The configuration of the Thread Local Allocation Buffers (TLABs)

value.label: TLABs Used
value.description: If Thread Local Allocation Buffers (TLABs) are in use

event.label: GC Heap Configuration
event.description: The configuration of the garbage collected heap

value.label: If Compressed Oops Are Used
value.description: If compressed Oops (Ordinary Object Pointers) are enabled

value.label: Compressed Oops Mode
value.description: The kind of compressed oops being used

value.label: Object Alignment
value.description: Object alignment (in bytes) on the heap

value.label: Heap Address Size
value.description: Heap Address Size (in bits)

event.label: Young Generation Configuration
event.description: The configuration of the young generation of the garbage collected heap

value.label: New Ratio
value.description: The size of the young generation relative to the tenured generation

value.label: User Mode CPU Load
value.description: User mode thread CPU load

value.label: System Mode CPU Load
value.description: System mode thread CPU load

value.label: Allocated
value.description: Approximate number of bytes allocated since thread start

event.label: Initial System Property
event.description: System Property at JVM start

value.label: Active Threads
value.description: Number of live active threads including both daemon and non-daemon threads

value.label: Daemon Threads
value.description: Number of live daemon threads

value.label: Accumulated Threads
value.description: Number of threads created and also started since JVM start

value.label: Peak Threads
value.description: Peak live thread count since JVM start or when peak count was reset

value.label: Loaded Class Count
value.description: Number of classes loaded since JVM start

value.label: Unloaded Class Count
value.description: Number of classes unloaded since JVM start

value.label: ClassLoaderData pointer
value.description: Pointer to the ClassLoaderData structure in the JVM

value.label: Classes
value.description: Number of loaded classes

value.label: Total Chunk Size
value.description: Total size of all allocated metaspace chunks (each chunk has several blocks)

value.label: Total Block Size
value.description: Total size of all allocated metaspace blocks (each chunk has several blocks)

value.label: Unsafe Anonymous Classes
value.description: Number of loaded classes to support invokedynamic

value.label: Total Unsafe Anonymous Classes Chunk Size
value.description: Total size of all allocated metaspace chunks for anonymous classes (each chunk has several blocks)

value.label: Total Unsafe Anonymous Classes Block Size
value.description: Total size of all allocated metaspace blocks for anonymous classes (each chunk has several blocks)
